attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL
attributes.review: if i was able to give this app less than one star i would! this is probably the worst thing i’ve ever downloaded do NOT waste your time

attributes.title: Not what I expected
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to find a reason to vote for Trump but he does not fit the interests of America. He is a fascist and is a terrible person. If you care about the future of America vote for Joe Biden 2020! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🦅🦅🦅

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: If there was a way to give this app one star I would most definitely do that cause this app is absolutely horrible

attributes.title: Horrible horrible 🤢🤮
attributes.review: Trump is mean, horrible and rude so that is why he shouldn’t be president anymore. Trump has done more damage to hurt a lot of people then any other president has. That is why I want Barack Obama to vote for president.

attributes.title: Worse App
attributes.review: This app is the worse app i have seen in history it is trash and no body should be able to download this app at all

attributes.title: Embarrassing
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could have a reason to find any reason to like the president. But I have failed. This app is horrible and a waste of time.

attributes.title: if there was a negative, i would have gone lower.
attributes.review: he’s racists, homophobic, fascist, narcissistic, etc. the list goes on. there’s quite literally no reason to have him represent our country. LITERALLY. i hate it here ✨

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app shouldn’t exist. It’s a disgrace to humanity and so is trump. It’s also sad that he wants to ban tik tok. Tik tok has no reason at all to be banned. Besides tik tok, Trump is a white supremacist. He’s a terrible person and I really wouldn’t care if he died in a fire.

attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️🌸THIS APP KILLS PEOPLE 🧚‍♂️🌸
attributes.review:
This app is awful it kept leading me to white supremacy pages and it made me want to move to a different country!! This app is cursed and the Cheeto that we call the president keeps haunting me in my dreams!! 
🧚‍♂️🌸This app needs to be destroyed🧚‍♂️🌸

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review:
I see the ashes falling out your window

So burn it till it's all gone
